subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: A vast majority of near-the-line shots called incorrectly by Wimbledon line judges have come on balls ruled out that were actually in, according to a study.
snippet: A vast majority of near-the-line shots called incorrectly by Wimbledon line judges have come on balls ruled out that were actually in, according to a study.
